title: Vogue events highlight Shanghai's "East meets West" culture
content:
Models present creations of Shanghai fashion brand during a salon show in east China's Shanghai, Dec. 22, 2020. (Xinhua/Chen Jianli)
SHANGHAI, Dec. 23 (Xinhua) --  A series of vogue events under the theme "History & Innovation of Shanghai Fashion" kicked off Tuesday in Shanghai and will last for a month.
A model presents a creation of a Shanghai fashion brand during a salon show in east China's Shanghai, Dec. 22, 2020. (Xinhua/Chen Jianli)
